Node.Name: CompilationUnitSyntax
Node.Documentation: Contains all declarations within an entire compilation unit.

Field.Name: Declarations
Field.Documentation: All declaration syntaxes within the compilation unit.

Field.Name: End
Field.Documentation: The end of input token.

Field.Name: Nodes
Field.Documentation: The unexpected syntax nodes.

Field.Name: FunctionKeyword
Field.Documentation: The 'func' keyword starting the declaration.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Documentation: The name of the declared function.

Field.Name: OpenParen
Field.Documentation: The open parenthesis before the parameter list.

Field.Name: ParameterList
Field.Documentation: The parameters this function declares.

Field.Name: CloseParen
Field.Documentation: The close parenthesis after the parameter list.

Field.Name: ReturnType
Field.Documentation: The return type of the function.

Field.Name: Body
Field.Documentation: The body of the function.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Documentation: The name of the declared label.

Field.Name: Colon
Field.Documentation: The colon after the label name.

Field.Name: Keyword
Field.Documentation: The keyword introducing the variable, either 'var' or 'val'.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Documentation: The name of the declared variable.

Field.Name: Type
Field.Documentation: The type of the declared variable.

Field.Name: Value
Field.Documentation: The initializer value for the variable.

Field.Name: Semicolon
Field.Documentation: The semicolon closing the variable declaration.

Node.Name: UnexpectedTypeExpressionSyntax
Node.Documentation: Unexpected input in type expression context.

Field.Name: Nodes
Field.Documentation: The unexpected syntax nodes.

Node.Name: NameTypeExpressionSyntax
Node.Documentation: A single identifier referencing a type name.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Documentation: The identifier referencing the type.

Field.Name: Nodes
Field.Documentation: The unexpected syntax nodes.

Field.Name: Declaration
Field.Documentation: The declaration wrapped.

Field.Name: Expression
Field.Documentation: The expression wrapped.

Field.Name: Nodes
Field.Documentation: The unexpected syntax nodes.

Node.Name: StatementExpressionSyntax
Node.Documentation: An expression that results in the unit type, while executing a statement.

Field.Name: Statement
Field.Documentation: The executed statement.

Node.Name: BlockExpressionSyntax
Node.Documentation: A code block with statements and a result value.

Field.Name: OpenBrace
Field.Documentation: The opening brace token.

Field.Name: Statements
Field.Documentation: The statements within the block.

Field.Name: Value
Field.Documentation: The value the block evaluates to.

Field.Name: CloseBrace
Field.Documentation: The closing brace token.

Field.Name: IfKeyword
Field.Documentation: The keyword 'if'.

Field.Name: OpenParen
Field.Documentation: The open parenthesis before the condition.

Field.Name: Condition
Field.Documentation: The condition.

Field.Name: CloseParen
Field.Documentation: The close parenthesis after the condition.

Field.Name: Then
Field.Documentation: The portion evaluated, if the condition is true.

Field.Name: Else
Field.Documentation: The portion evaluated, if the condition is false.

Field.Name: WhileKeyword
Field.Documentation: The keyword 'while'.

Field.Name: OpenParen
Field.Documentation: The open parenthesis before the condition.

Field.Name: Condition
Field.Documentation: The condition.

Field.Name: CloseParen
Field.Documentation: The close parenthesis after the condition.

Field.Name: Then
Field.Documentation: The portion evaluated repeatedly, while the condition is true.
